Grid is devided in 100 cols (col-100)

It has following MEDIA QUERIES

XS
col-xs-100
0 -  768px

SM:
col-sm-100
768px - 991px,

MD:
col-md-100
992px - 1199px,

LG:
col-lg-100
1200px - 1500px,

XLG:
col-xlg-100
1500px - 2000px,

XXLG:
col-xxlg-100
screen > 2000px


Example:
<div class="row"
    <div class="col-xlg-50"
        ...

Media queries for offset exist to!
defined as: col-md-offset-30
